channel.title: Custom item glitch
channel.description:
Well, First of all, I get this problem. If i put everything correct, all my custom items are in the correct equip spot, When i walk around, my character moves funny. How do i fix that.?? Also, If I Have a custom item equipt, and whenever i take it off of my guy, then it turns into dwarf remains . Im using cleaned v4. If you know, please help me. If not, Post that you dont know, atleast you tried .
NOTE: Please answer both questions, im tired of asking people 2 and they only answer one.

item.title: Custom item glitch
item.dc:creator: @BubbleScape_x BubbleScape x
item.description:
@BubbleScape_x wrote:

Well, First of all, I get this problem. If i put everything correct, all my custom items are in the correct equip spot, When i walk around, my character moves funny. How do i fix that.??
